Attributes.description: The use of probability and statistical methods for engineering applications. Mechanics of materials, heat transfer, and fluid dynamics. Instrumentation, data acquisition, and data manipulation using modern computational tools.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of MECH 220, MECH 223, MECH 224, MECH 225.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue, Start Time: 17:00, End Time: 20:00
